subject: Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Mark Cavendish won Stage 5 of the Tour de France, but many remained focused on Ted King, who disputed his elimination from the race for being too slow in Stage 4.
snippet: Mark Cavendish won Stage 5 of the Tour de France, but many remained focused on Ted King, who disputed his elimination from the race for being too slow in Stage 4.
